title: How Do I Tell Her That She’s Not Really My Daughter?
description:
Today, we hear from a man wondering how to tell his daughter he’s not her biological dad. Then, we get a special follow-up call from a mom who finally told her son the real story of how his father died. And finally, we talk with a wife hoping to bring back the fun, flexible woman she once was.
Lyrics of the Day: "Mystery" - Turnstile
Let us know what’s going on by leaving a voicemail at 844.693.3291 or visiting johndelony.com/show.
 Support Our Sponsors:
